heading: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are some frequently asked questions about Dr. Vivek Vasudeo's practice and urological health.

list.name: What conditions does Dr. Vasudeo specialize in?
list.content: Dr. Vasudeo specializes in uro-oncology and robotic surgery, focusing on various complex urological conditions.

list.name: What are robotic surgeries?
list.content: Robotic surgeries are minimally invasive procedures performed with the assistance of robotic systems, allowing for greater precision and reduced recovery time.

list.name: How can I schedule a consultation?
list.content: You can schedule a consultation by contacting the Max Healthcare facility where Dr. Vasudeo practices or through their online appointment system.

list.name: What is the recovery time after robotic surgery?
list.content: Recovery time varies by procedure, but many patients experience quicker recovery times compared to traditional surgery methods.
